about_the_game:
This dark fantasy yuri visual novel is the third and last game in the Tales From The Under-Realms trilogy. While there are a few references to the other two games, it can be enjoyed as a stand-alone story.



In this installment, the enigmatic Nameless God tracks the odyssey of three heroines: Lilith, the half-demoness; Odette, a devout warrior-monk of the Goddess of Truth, Irijo; and Evelyn, a formidable half-elf pyromancer and familiar face from TFTU: After Midnight.

As the tale unfolds, our trio finds themselves in dire straits, ensnared by ‘The Seven’—a cabal of sorcerers who have seized control of Grimoire and exert their will over much of the fantastical realm of Aravorn.

Despite the grim outset, the combined valor and cunning of the heroines fuel a daring escape from Grimoire, toppling a swath of the wizardry dominion in their wake. Now fugitives, their sole beacon of hope lies in reaching Shacklesplit, a haven nestled across the ocean on the shores of Zoltar.

The story will follow the adventures of Lilith, Odette and Evelyn, as they navigate through numerous challenges to achieve different potential outcomes. Set in a dark fantasy world, this game intensifies the tone established by its predecessors, offering a blend of joyous, sorrowful, and bittersweet moments and endings.

The Cast


This game will be more expansive and lengthier than its predecessors, featuring a larger ensemble of characters.


Lilith is one of the many half-demons that inhabit Aravorn. Half demons used to live harmoniously with other species. However, the peace has been shattered as she and her kind are now pursued by The Seven. Known for her captivating allure, Lilith’s free-spirited charm is hard to ignore. Throughout the narrative, she may find herself romantically entwined with Odette or Evelyn.


Once a loyal warrior-monk devoted to the Goddess, Irijo, Odette is now on the outs with her order thanks to her rebellious streak. She's currently trying to make amends for her past slip-ups, carrying a load of secrets and shadows in the process. As for love? Well, she figures that ship has sailed, lost somewhere in the mess of her past.


Evelyn ran away from Lothark many years ago, fleeing from her abusive father, Samael. As a half-elf, the passage of centuries has left her appearance untouched, yet the trials she endured sculpted her character. She presents a facade of cold-heartedness, devoid of empathy, save for a soft spot reserved for her brother Bhorg.

content_descriptors.notes:
This experience explores adult relationships, features sexually explicit content, references to submissive/dominant behaviour, general mature themes and some strong language. All characters in the story are over 21 years old.
It is intended for persons age 18 and older.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: The archwizards are out of control, running a witch hunt all over Aravorn. Will the three heroines put an end to it? Fight evil wizards, find romance and unlock different endings in this dark fantasy yuri visual novel.
